name: Burnin' It At Both Ends
description:
This is a competitive fire-spreading strategy game made for school. Set fire to the opponent's home base to win. Fire spreads along the tiles once it's depleted them of health (the number). More detailed instructions are included in the zip.

2 players, you can use the keyboard or xbox controllers.

Have fun trying to burn each other down.

By JohnLee Cooper & Bradley LeDonne
